inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic of diabetes before the age of 35 years, with initial ketosis and requirement for permanent insulin treatment within 1 year of diagnosis
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic of diabetes before the age of 35 years and past or present diagnosis of severe diabetic retinopathy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients presenting autoimmune diseases, HIV or HCV infections
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with glomerular filtration rate < 60 mL min-1 1.73 m2 without diabetic retinopathy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe gastrointestinal symptoms and laboratory findings consistent with STEC infection, which may be a contraindication for participation in this trial.
